title: What's with all the Hecarim's top?
body:
Iv been against 2 of these today, been watching a few pro stream uploads on YouTube and i'm seeing a lot of top lane mains (e.g. Dyrus) playing heaps of Hecarim top...

Why is this suddenly a thing?

replies.body:
I could be wrong but it may or may not because a player originally from OCE, Keane. He played on Curse when they had an OCE team and then got transferred to Curse Academy in NA. They recently made it into the LCS through the expansion tournament and have since been renamed to Gravity!

But Keane played a few games of Hecarim mid and showed that it could work in lane and scales pretty well.
Why do you guys ignore the rads error problem??
his team fight potential is quite alot greater than alot of top laners, tp ganks are monstrous on him and i think i saw it in the championship series a few weeks ago or on epl
he can lane gank like a boss after he backs and go mid ez kills 4 days
